title: Power cuts of over 3 hours scheduled for next two days
body_lines: The Public Utilities Commission of Sri Lanka (PUCSL) says it has approved the request from the Ceylon Electricity Board (CEB) for power cuts of 03 hours and 20 minutes for April 19 and 20, due to the unavailability of fuel for thermal power plants.
All Areas ABCDEFGHIJKLPQRSTUVW - 02 hours between 9.00 a.m. and 5.00 p.m. and 01 hour & 20 minutes between 5.00 p.m. and 9.00 p.m.
Demand Management Schedule (April 19th-20th, 2022) by Ada Derana on Scribd
